value:
Summoned during the harvest
festival? The timing could not
be better... It must be fate.$k$pPumpkin pie... Giant turkey leg...
Hmm... Which to eat first?

If there were no more wars...would
everybody be able to eat whatever
they want, as much as they want?

This is bad. I've only eaten enough
for three people today... My stomach
is rumbling... I might just faint.

I'm not picky. If it even looks like
food, I'll eat it. Sweet, spicy...it
doesn't matter.

Ooh... That pumpkin looks so cute...
and tasty. Wait, it's not for eating?
Just decoration? Oh.

There's some tasty food over at the
harvest festival. Come on, let's go to
$Nf's castle.

I worked so hard... And now my
stomach's rumbling.
I still have a huge appetite...
So hungry... Can't move...
Is this tasty? I'm hungry...

My name is Ilyana... I know we've
only just met, but can you spare
any food? I'm famished...

I love festivals... Food stalls, seasonal
dishes, desserts as far as the eye can
see... They're bursting with flavor.$k$pAnd the most wonderful of all is the
harvest festival, held to celebrate
autumn's bounty.$k$pJust saying the words "harvest festival"
makes my mouth water...$k$pLook at all of this candy... All I had to
do was threaten people with tricks,
and they just gave it to me!$k$pI really must thank you for inviting
me here, $Nu.$k$pI'll even share some of my haul with
you. Just a little bit. What do you
like? Pick...one.
やあ…
そこです
うっ…
甘くありません…
Candy? Any candy...
I'll harvest you!
You'll get no treats here!
I'll take your sweets...
Low blood sugar…
Sigh...
A "harvest festival," hm? I like the sound of that...
...Hm? Oh! I'm not—I'm not giving out treats...
You wanna know my favorite sweets? All of them... I like anything I can eat.
When I eat sweets, it always makes me crave something spicy… Got anything?
Whatever costume you want me to wear is fine, so long as I get some candy out of it...
I am so serious about my tricks, you'll WANT to give me a treat.
You're sweet... You and candy have that in common. Must be why I like you.
Time to feed.
So hungry...
As long as there's treats...
